origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_lending_analysis', 'description': 'This function provides a lending analysis for a specified cryptocurrency based on the analysis period and a specific date.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency to analyze.'}, {'name': 'analysisPeriod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The period for which the lending analysis is required.'}, {'name': 'date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'A specific date for which historical data is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisReport', 'description': 'The lending analysis report for the specified cryptocurrency.'}, {'name': 'historicalPrice', 'description': 'The historical price data for the specified date.'}]} 
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_lending_analysis, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Aave', 'analysisPeriod'是'1 month', 'date'是'2026-10-01'.
